# lionsgateplay.com

~~~
url = https://lionsgateplay.com/en/movies/american-psycho/392430632418
monetization = FLATRATE
country = India
country = Indonesia
country = Malaysia
~~~

with VPN we get:

> Sorry...This video is not available in your country.

with:

~~~
India 106.192.0.0
/~q/x-forwarded-for/106.192.0.0
~~~

if we click sign up, we get:

403 Forbidden
